ing: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans frozen concentrated raspberry-kiwi juice, partially thawed
2 (2 liter) bottles raspberry creme soda, chilled
des: "I made a double batch of this recipe and served it to 40 people at a wedding shower. It was a big hit."
ins: Place raspberry-kiwi juice concentrate in a large punch bowl, Slowly pour in creme soda. Using an ice cream scoop, drop in scoops of sherbet.
